page.title: 04The Holt Vineyard
page.content: {The Holt Vineyard}is owned by Brigadier and Mrs. Turner.It is situated in Woolton Hill and was started in 1977.They decided to grow vines because they had some spare land which they wanted to put to good use.The land is suitable for growing vines on because it is stoney,well drained and reflects the heat from the sun.The vineyard covers 1.2 acres and there are 1430 vines.All the grapes are white except for one sort which is black.They bought the eight types of vines from the Isles of Wight and discovered that the most suitable were {Muller_Thurgau,Madeleine {Angevire}and{Siagerrbe.}The wine they make is called{Woodhay}and is a dry white wine.
